Package org.group8.simulator.framework

Class AbstractHealthCentre

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.group8.simulator.framework.AbstractHealthCentre
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, IHealthCentre
Direct Known Subclasses:
HealthCentre
public abstract class AbstractHealthCentre extends Thread implements IHealthCentre
Abstract class representing the core logic of a healthcare simulation. This class provides the base structure for handling simulation events, controlling the simulation thread, and managing the simulation clock. It extends Thread to allow the simulation to run in a separate thread.
